__e: If you need anything, just tell me.
Well, anything I can do for you, you name it.
Listen, Maggie, if you and the little girl need anything, you just tell me, okay?
You do that, jerk. You tell your old man.
I can't remember. 15, 16 million. 16 million? Tell this fool - he doesn't believe it.
What did I say? What did I say? Did I say anything?
Don't tell me, tell the police.
Say it again. Say it louder so we can hear.
If you say that I am like my mother one more time, if you say it one more time, I will leave.
Oh, say that once again while gazing upward if you can, upward to this light
You tell him that you refused to help me pedal back!
Tell him and everything will be okay.
Tell it to her face, get it off your back.
You can tell me, we're friends.
Go on, say it. "I told you so."
Just say the word and you'll be released.
"Whatever you want, just name it and it's yours.
Just say it and I can make whatever you like.
